column4: anyone know what the minimum allocated hard drive space is required to run ubuntu?
im doing a fresh 32bit install off the iso
into a vmware environment that i gotta duplicate 500 some odd times

you can do an "expandable" partition (at least in virtualbox).  You create say a 10GB partition and if you actually use only 3GB, then the file on the host system will have 3GB.  They say it's a bit slower, though.
